Detailed Description

A part of a multipart mime message.

Abstract super class.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum MimePart::characterSet
 

Type of character set.

Enumeration values:
CHARSET_ISO_8859_1  ISO-8859-1.
CHARSET_UTF_8  UTF-8.
CHARSET_END  End of characterSet, not a character set.

Definition at line 34 of file MimePart.h.

enum MimePart::transferEncoding
 

Type of transfer encoding.

Enumeration values:
TRANSFER_ENCODING_BASE64  Base64 encoding blows about 33%.
TRANSFER_ENCODING_END  End of transferEncoding, not a transfer encoding.

Definition at line 52 of file MimePart.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

MimePart::MimePart (  const byte *  buff,
uint32  buffLength,
mainContentType  mainType,
const char *  contentLocation,
bool  copyLocation,
transferEncoding  encoding = TRANSFER_ENCODING_BASE64
) 
 

Constructs a new MimePart.

Parameters:
buff The buffer with the data to add.
buffLength The length of buff.
mainType The main type of the content.
contentLocation The URI of the content. If empty string then no location is set for the part.
copyLocation If the contentLocation string should be copied or just keep a pointer to it.
encoding The transfer encoding to use on the data, default base64 encoding is used.

Copy constructor, creates a new copy of other.

uint32  buffLength,
transferEncoding  encoding,
uint32 &  outLength
)  [static]
 

Unencodes a transferencoded buffer.

Parameters:

encoding The type of transferEncoding to use.
outLength Set the the length of the returned bufer
